oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mossy Creek Farm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lithographs; Agriculture; Farmhouses; Farm life; Mills; Livestock; Dirt roads; Bridges
Agriculture; Lithographs; Jefferson County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lithograph of the Mossy Creek Farm in Jefferson County (Tenn.) depicting a mill, farm buidings, houses, farm animals, roads, and a bridge.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: James Gray Smith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The lithograph accompanied the 1842 edition of J. Gray Smith's "Review of East Tennessee," a promotional tract of the East Tennessee Land Company designed to encourage the sale of farm lands in the area.
